title: Flourless banana honey cake
ingredients: ['3 ripe bananas', '80ml honey', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 eggs, separated', '40g chopped walnuts', 'ground cinnamon to taste (optional)', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, or to taste (optional)', '1 teaspoon ground allspice, or to taste (optional)', 'salt to taste']
